definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] possession (? so RV), perh. better place of possession, place possessed by; only cstr. [[מִמְשַׁק חָרוּל]] Zep 2:9 a place possessed by chickpeas (> AV breeding of nettles), LXX Dahaskov. Word very dubious (We GASm); text prob. corrupt; Schwally:ZAW x. 1890, 188 conj. meaning place of growth; Gr (so Now) prop. [[קִמּוֹשׂ]], or [[קִמְּשׂנִים]].
